an3.5:4.3: Ayoniso pañhaṃ kattā hoti, ayoniso pañhaṃ vissajjetā hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṃ vissajjitaṃ parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi siliṭṭhehi upagatehi nābbhanumoditā hoti.
an3.5:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.5:5.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
